author: Marcos Luna
comment: Its really a good saving app. Because it helps you save with all the debit and credit cards you currently used.  The only thing I don't like is that when I want to withdraw any amount, it takes about a week to get transfer to my account. Just wish there was an instant option.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Marcos, thank you for your feedback! Pease note withdrawals are regulated by the SEC and FINRA and are subject to bank processing times. It can take 3-6 business days for withdrawals to fully reflect on your checking account. This time period is provided in order to adhere to SEC regulations that dictate a mandatory 2 day settlement period.

author: KQ Gator
comment: Extremely easy to use for someone who is interested in saving for the future by investing, but doesn't really know where to start. Roundups has been very helpful getting me to see a little can add up to a lot in a small amount of time. I tested withdrawals and the money was in my account in the amount of days promised. I like that the money is not as easy to withdraw as the money in my regular savings because I am not as tempted to use for little purchases, that I really don't need. I plan on reinvesting the money I withdrew back into Acorns now I know the withdrawal worked as promised. I like the versatility of one-time, automatic or roundup ×1 ×2, just change or round 1.00 up as well and that I can change settings anytime I want. If things are going good, slow, bonus at work etc...So far I like just about everything and I have read some amazing tips on here that I may not have stumbled upon elsewhere. 👍👍.

author: Alexa Newman
comment: Ive been using this since Nov. 2016, auto investing with the "moderate" risk settings. I made $70 total. I have a Roth IRA and a 403b that are much better options for me in the long run. The rounds ups is decent I guess. Just not seeing the added value.

author: Laura Stutzman
comment: Invests your money in terrible, terrible organizations like Chase and HSBC, which has legally admitted to moving money for cartels and terrorists, and you get absolutely no say in it whatsoever. Come up with an ethical investment bundle, and maybe I'll consider using your service again.

author: Jason Martin
comment: The more money I put in, the more money they lose. I don't think I have seen my account positive ever. You would get more return with a low interest savings account than this garbage. But hey they will link you a story that promises things will get better. And when they do we will lose all that too.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Jason, thank you for your feedback. Please keep in mind that Acorns was created with frequent and long-term investing in mind. Feel free to check out this video on guidelines for investing https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTDd99tLUVA or email us at support@acorns.com if you have any questions!

author: Adan Caro
comment: After having it for over six months,  It can make you minimal money, but lose you a lot more. Finding it annoying. Plus there's a 1$ monthly fee.

author: Gabrielle Horton
comment: Absolutely one of the best decisions I have ever made. In just one month I have accumulated almost $150.00 by investing as little as $10 a month. It's AMAZING how much money my change adds up to as well. Highly suggest!

author: Nolan Woodworks Art Company
comment: I downloaded the app and then starting reading the reviews. Way too many people complaining they can't get their money, can't verify accounts, but still have them easily charging them every month without fail. Make sure you read the reviews before you make the decision to go with these guys.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi there, we're sorry to hear that you feel this way. Keep in mind that you're more than welcome to request a withdrawal from your Acorns account and have the funds deposited back into your linked checking account. If you have any questions, please reach out to us at support@acorns.com.

comment: Just started using acorn so not sure how good it is, lost for 5 days straight so need to wait for long term results.

author: Sean Contreras
comment: Great investing app for people who want to plan for the future but either don't really want to get into day trading or don't really know how stocks work.

author: D.T. Days
comment: Poor customer service. They do not respond inquiries. The only reason I started an account was to round up my change. After having an account open for 27 days, not a single cent was rounded up an invested. I had my account linked and my cards linked. I use my cards regularly.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi there, we're very sorry to hear that your concerns haven't been addressed and we'd really like to assist you. When you get a chance, please reach out to us at support@acorns.com and one of our representatives will be happy to help.

author: Anthony Silvestri
comment: It's a nice way to start investing , small increments and loose change. This may replace my savings account

author: Garrett Wright
comment: Maybe you can and I just haven't figured it out but I wish you can see what specific things you invested in. But I love it besides that

author: brittany lobb
comment: Helps me save money by rounding up and putting that change away

author: Kevin Simmons
comment: Beware of a craigslist scammer named Matt. He'll say he's going to pay you 60 bucks to download,  register,  and give feedback on your experience. Long story short...... This is just a desperate attempt to gain more users of this app and Stash as well.  Really lame and a waste of time.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Kevin, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience that this matter has caused you. Please reach out to us at support@acorns.com with your concerns and we'll be able to research this matter further for you.

author: Danny Perez
comment: Great app, hoping it helps me with my personal savings when I retire!

author: Shahul Usman
comment: Just signed up.. Very easy, like the concept.. As an app, it's well laid out.. Question.. Ebay is "found money" so if I buy something, linked to my PayPal (linked to my bank account) on eBay.. Does that get "found money"?

author: Willow Bodkin
comment: It keeps unblinking my bank but other than that I love it

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Willow, we're very sorry to hear that you're experiencing this. Unfortunately, Acorns cannot control how often the bank requests re-authentication of the Round-Up Account. Please feel free to email us at support@acorns.com if you need any further assistance with your account and a representative will be more than happy to help!

author: Ray Rivera
comment: Simple, automatic, and safe. Its like an external piggy bank with intrest.

author: OnePieceZoro 36
comment: It's a good way to save money by putting aside little. It's at a time. I think most of the way to make money though is by the round ups, weekly deposites, and one time deposites... not the stock market feature.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi there, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! Please note that Acorns was created with frequent and long-term investing in mind. Feel free to check out this video on guidelines for investing https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTDd99tLUVA or email us at support@acorns.com if you have any questions!

author: Tony deluca
comment: I really like this app and company. Makes it easy to invest.

author: becky forsythe
comment: It's OK. Unable to access customer service to ask questions though. Helping to save money.

author: Carla Thornton
comment: So far so good only been a few days...

author: Brittney Martinez
comment: Super easy to use and lots of great ways to squirrel away money. Makes me feel a little better about my financial future.

author: James White
comment: Great way to invest, and save automatically.

author: Matthew Niver
comment: good app to start investing with little money. it's easy and the resorces for learning are really nice for beginners

author: Daniel Moline
comment: You all are terrible.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Daniel, we're very sorry to hear that you feel this way and we'd really like to address any questions or concerns that you have. If you'd like, please reach out to us at support@acorns.com with any feedback that you may have for us.

author: Eric G
comment: Very helpful with saving money

author: Ed
comment: Love the app easy to use and  start investing  with a few dollars.

author: Miguel Mendoza
comment: It's working so far.

author: Clemont Washington
comment: Great way to save and grow your funds in a diversified portfolio. Your not just saving. Your investing your savings.
Great for a little savings

author: Levi Stanley
comment: Good stuff.

author: Renee Code
comment: Love this App!  It's a subtle way to save and the investing component is fun to watch.

author: Mills Fortune
comment: It's cool
Best app to invest an save money as well don't know what I would do without it

author: Merle Ann Fenske
comment: I am new and just discovering all of this apps applications. I hope to learn more as I go on.

author: Derek K.
comment: Great concept didn't work well for me and just kept losing money.

reply.author: Acorns
reply.content: Hi Derek, we're sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with your experience. Please keep in mind that Acorns was created with frequent and long-term investing in mind. Feel free to check out this video on guidelines for investing https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTDd99tLUVA or email us at support@acorns.com if you have any questions!

author: Rufus W. Bailey
comment: A Dollar Earned, A Quarter Saved!

author: Clay Harrison
comment: Great app! I love saving on the side!!!
